Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet the highest standards of excellence. This product holds immense value to me due to its unique features and the dedication put into its creation. Considering its quality and the benefits it offers, I am extending an exclusive opportunity for you to acquire it at a special introductory price of $10000. This offer is tailored to ensure you have the chance to experience the unparalleled value this product provides without compromising on cost. I look forward to your consideration and hope we can bring this exceptional product into your possession soon. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $10,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $10,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $8,000
